description: Sum of first n lucky numbers.
comments: The subsequence of prime partial sums of lucky numbers begins: 11, 401, 1259, 2039. The subsequence of lucky partial sums of lucky numbers begins: 33, 69, 195, 537, 685, 1501, 5191. [From _Jonathan Vos Post_, Feb 11 2010]
mathematica: luckyLimit = 300; t = Range[1, luckyLimit, 2]; sieve[n_] := Module[{k = t[[n]]},  t = Delete[t, Table[{i}, {i, k, Length[t], k}]]]; n = 1; While[t[[n]] < Length[t], n++; sieve[n]]; Accumulate[t]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 05 2011 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
